text: Gabriella Pozzuolo-Marchi (born 28 November 1946) is a retired Italian gymnast. She competed at the 1968 Olympics in all artistic gymnastics events with the best result of 59th place on the uneven bars. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Genoa Category:Gymnasts at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Italian female artistic gymnasts
title: Gabriella Pozzuolo
